plot: A road documentary on musician/activist Steve Earle, who courted controversy with the release of his album Jerusalem. Live performance, interviews and on-stage monologues give insight into the performer's take on post-9/11 America.
title: Just an American Boy
plot_es: A road documentary on musician/activist Steve Earle, who courted controversy with the release of his album Jerusalem. Live performance, interviews and on-stage monologues give insight into the performer's take on post-9/11 America.
plot_en: A road documentary on musician/activist Steve Earle, who courted controversy with the release of his album Jerusalem. Live performance, interviews and on-stage monologues give insight into the performer's take on post-9/11 America.
